content.prompt: Which of the following is the primary reason for the tensions that exist between the legislative and executive branches of the federal government?

choices.label: Each branch sets and approves the otherâ€™s budget.
The branches are staffed with many of the same people.
The branches have different constituencies with different interests.
The branches are responsible for the selection of Cabinet-level officials.
Each branch has the constitutional power to levy taxes.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors illustrated in different scenarios in context.
